page.title: 06TRADITIONAL RECIPES
page.content: RUM BUTTER 1 lb. soft brown sugar, 1/2 level teaspoon nutmeg, 8 oz. butter and 2 tablespoons of rum. Put butter into a pan, melt, pour onto sugar and add nutmeg. Stir with a wooden spoon until thoroughly mixed, add rum and stir until a smooth texture is reached. Allow to set. ROLLED GINGERBREAD 1and1/2 lb. Plain flour, 9 ozs. lard, 9 ozs. sugar, 2 tablespoons treacle, 1 teaspoon each of ginger, mixed spice, salt and cinnamon. 1and1/2 teasp. bicarb. soda, 3/4 cup warm water. Mix all the dry ingredients and rub in the lard, add treacle and water and knead till it is a stiff dough. Roll on baking sheet and mark with fork diagonally. Bake in a medium oven until cooked.
